TextView.android:text: Our topic will be a video history question game. The name of my project is "I remember it like it was yesterday". There will be 10 video questions (at least 2 tests x10 questions). The application will cover all world history. First, the login page will appear. There will be 3 buttons on this page. These are: Get started, information for the quiz, and about the application. You will see the question and the video about the question, and you will get a little clue about the question by playing the video. There will be a button for true and false. If you know the correct answer, it will say "True" at the bottom; if you don't know, it will say "False". The 33rd button will be "Next". With this you will move on to the next question. While making the application, I will use Android studio and Java as code. I will design the interfaces in XML and write the necessary commands in the code section.

The Republic in Turkey, which introduced the rule of "Sovereignty Unconditionally Belongs to the Nation" to the state administration, is 100 years old.
